translations: （非正式）破旧的，劣质的；旧式的；不舒服的

sentences.sentence: His body will dry in ropey tatters.
sentences.translation: 他的尸体将碎成一丝丝变干。

sentences.sentence: I feel a bit ropey today.
Cruised to qualification after a ropey first-half during their first game against Andorra.
sentences.translation: 首战对阵安道尔的上半场比赛步履蹒跚，但之后一路扶摇直上，轻松出线。
